{{ardayearheader: * The judgement of [[Fëanor]] before the [[Valar]]; [[Melkor]]'s lies are revealed.<ref name="AA">{{AA

Year of the Trees 1410: P2k}}, note 10</ref> [[Finwë]] his father goes to exile with him. They build a stronghold at [[Formenos]] and hide the [[Silmarils]] in an iron vault.<ref name="AA"/>

{{ardayearheader: * [[Fingolfin]] becomes the ruler of the [[Noldor]] in [[Tirion]].<ref name="AA"/>
* [[Tulkas]] goes after Melkor, but Melkor casts a shadow about himself and goes into hiding.<ref name="AA"/>
